feedback:
Vaidas quickly adapted to his role as developer within the Analytics and Experimentation team. He rapidly familiarized himself with our systems and technologies, consistently asking relevant and insightful questions that helped him deepen his understanding and enhance his skills as a developer.

Throughout the project, he demonstrated a strong desire to learn and improve, gaining both in-depth knowledge about our services and a broader understanding of the technologies we used and the entire project estate.

Vaidas is always eager to take on new and bigger challenges, even in areas that were unfamiliar to him, to facilitate his continuous improvement. As a newly formed team without fully established best practices, it was always a pleasure and insightful to discuss potential approaches with Vaidas. His contributions helped us become a more effective team and consistently deliver high-quality results.

By building on his knowledge and utilizing his skills, Vaidas was eventually comfortable engaging with the client directly to discuss and refine requirements, answer questions, and offer advice. He established a strong relationship with the client, which improved knowledge sharing between our team and the client, managed their expectations, and generally enhanced the relationship.

Vaidas is proactive in picking up tasks as needed to help us meet our goals and deliver results for the client. This included development, code reviews, QA, and release preparation.

Overall, it was a pleasure working with Vaidas. He has shown his abilities as both an individual developer and a strong team member with a passion for learning, and I look forward to collaborating on future projects.

Continue growing your development skills in your next project, pursue cloud certification, and keep delivering high-quality code!
name: A.S.

feedback:
It has been a pleasure to work with Vaidas who has constantly showcased his excellent skills as a developer and colleague.

On joining the team Vaidas quickly familiarised himself with the systems and technologies we used, asking relevant and thoughtful questions that would help him gain a deeper understanding and improve his skills as a developer.

Throughout his time on the project, he was always looking to learn more and keep improving these skills, both by gaining more in-depth knowledge about our services, but also wider knowledge around the technologies used and the whole TOD estate.

Vaidas was always willing to take on new and bigger challenges, even in areas where he was not familiar, to allow himself to keep improving.

As a new team we did not have fully established best practices, and it was always a pleasure and insightful to discuss with Vaidas what approaches the team could be taking and what we could do to improve the team. This led to us being a more effectives team and delivering a higher standard, consistently.

By continuing to build his knowledge and leveraging his skills, towards the end of the project he was comfortable reaching out to the client to discuss/refine requirements, answer any questions they had and offer advice. He developed a strong relationship with the client, where he boosted the knowledge sharing between our team and the client, managed their expectations and generally improved the relationship overall.

Vaidas was always proactive in picking up tickets where needed to help us achieve our goals and deliver for the client, this included doing development, code review, QA and release preparation.

It was a pleasure to work with Vaidas, he has shown his skills as both an individual developer and strong member of the team, with a passion and desire to learn and I look forward to collaborating on future projects.
name: M.K.

feedback:

feedback:
Vaidas has shown good initiative and dedication, taking on tickets in various stages (Development, QA, Release preparation) to help push them across the board, this not only helps to meet our sprint goals but also helps the team to deliver work constantly and consistently.

Vaidas has built a good relationship with the customer allowing for him to collaborate and clarify requirements and expectations of experiments and deliver them to this standard.

Vaidas has shown and grown his knowledge in many areas, building an understanding of the MVT (Multivariate testing) approach, using Java, Jenkins, AWS and other development tools in his day to day and strong teamwork. 

For the future I think Vaidas should continue to build deeper technical knowledge around testing tools, development techniques, and AWS.
